text: The 1938 Rice Owls football team was an American football team that represented Rice University as a member of the Southwest Conference (SWC) during the 1938 college football season. In its fifth season under head coach Jimmy Kitts, the team compiled a 4–6 record (3–3 against SWC opponents) and was outscored by a total of 133 to 91. ==Schedule== ==References== Rice Category:Rice Owls football seasons Rice
title: 1938 Rice Owls football team
